title: Python Backend Engineer

Implemented multi-language support for text processing across 13 different languages.
Applied repository pattern and registry pattern following backend best practices.
Developed Pydantic models ensuring data validation and type safety throughout the system.
Created agent-based architecture allowing seamless LLM integration for text transformation.
